channel.title: Making an object walk/do an emote? [PI]
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering if there was a method in which an object could "walk", so to speak, or do an animation.
Thanks.

item.title: Making an object walk/do an emote? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Np man. If you need any help doing this, I can help you. Rep ++ for trying to do something unique

Read full topic
item.source: Making an object walk/do an emote? [PI]

item.title: Making an object walk/do an emote? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Yeah I thought about that too, just wanted to see if there would be a way to make it move while it’s still an object.

Well thanks, anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: Making an object walk/do an emote? [PI]

item.title: Making an object walk/do an emote? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Do you mean move on it’s own? The way to do that would be convert the object to an npc, add it as a still npc, then trigger it in whereever it would be for your base.

Read full topic
